trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around July 13th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with my roomate, when we notice a really bright super bright orange light in the sky. Unlike anything we have ever seen. We see this Bright orange like, flicker on off, and shoots up straight into the sky at a extremely fast rate, and disappears. Afterward we see another object trailing behind and disappears instantly too.
Summary: Orange Fireball like, flashing, acending towards sky at an extremely fast rate
